response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to you, worth $1,200,000 to you personally. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,350,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We understand that every decision is carefully considered, and we are confident that this offer will meet your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
